title: (x) SMW News, Delicious Bowels logos - Voxbox, Impact {Angel, Brett Jordan}
content:
Hello,

I’m looking for a good font for a logo, like this one:  
 [http://www.smnnews.com/banner/boardlogo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203248/http:/www.smnnews.com/banner/boardlogo.gif)  
or that one:  
 [http://www.delicious-bowels.com/webzine/templates/delicious\_pre/images/header.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203248/http:/www.delicious-bowels.com/webzine/templates/delicious_pre/images/header.jpg)

I already tried whatthefont without success. Would be a pleasure if anyone would know something:)

Andreas

 [‹ (x) Sans used in German phone directory - Frutiger {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203248/http:/typophile.com/node/38508 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Party" washed script - Marcelle (Monotype Script Bold) {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203248/http:/typophile.com/node/38535 "Go to next forum topic")
author: godisatheist

comments.content: and i’m fairly sure that the second sample is good old-fashioned Impact, squooshed and stretcherated

thanks again! I checked it, you’re right Brett!  
Both of this fonts works good as a logo, I will have to choose now...

This website rules! Cheers & delicious bowels :)  
Andreas
